title: gardenharvester
blurb: Radio Garden stream harvesting & tagging with schedules, segmentation, and rich metadata (ID3/Opus, cue/chapters).
description: gardenharvester records Radio Garden streams you configure. It supports cron-like schedules, station calendars, silence/VAD-based segmentation, loudness normalization, and automatic titling (Station · Show · Date/Time). Outputs MP3/Opus (FLAC optional), creates cue sheets & chapters, and writes JSONL manifests for reproducible libraries. Includes a lightweight local web UI and rate-limited fetcher with consent lists.
